name: Mike Evans
text:
It's not the Pizza Hut we want, but it's the Pizza Hut we have. The staff is...present albeit stressed. Constantly.
I've had fantastic Pizza Hut pizzas and good experiences at Pizza Hut, just not at this location. That being said, I've not had a terrible experience at this location either.

name: Dawn Trank
text: Not that great. Ordered double pepperoni and pineapple. My pepperoni wasn't doubled and I was lucky to get 2 or 3 little pieces of pineapple on each slice. Crust was tough and hard to chew. Haven't had pizza in months and was so looking forward to it. Big disappointment.

text: Staff nice customer service good but will give u cold food if u don't check it. Still pricey for pizza use online coupons.

text: Loved the Philly Cheesesteak sub, and the Italian Sausage Marinara noodles.

name: Gary Davis
text: I order pizza at least once a week from the store on our busy days when we have to be places and don't have time to cook. It's always hot and most of the time the order is correct. That's why I'm giving you a 4 star. When they have gotten the order wrong they do fix it. I still recommend Pizza Hut for your pizza needs.
